page.title: 17Walks in the Glanaman area.
page.content: A number of public footpaths are to be found in this area. It is possible to enjoy many walks by making use of this network of footpaths.... {A. From village to borders of Black { Mountain - 2 and a half miles.} North along Tirycoed Road. Right along footpath at map ref.673143. Through woodland and across farmland to Cwmffrwd Farm. Left to cattle grid which allows access to open mountain. {B. Circular route along country lanes. { 6 or 7 miles. Begin at map ref.668139. Left along Nant-y-Glyn Road for one and a half miles. Right at junction with Heol Ddu, through Cathilas Farm. Right and then left along footpath to Glynhir Mansion. Right along Glynhir Road and right again at 644158. Cross Wern Ddu Road. Turn right to the Angel Inn, then follow Amman Road to start.
